summary: Seven friends, after their car breaks down in the middle of the night, find shelter and tell one another stories to kill time till dawn.
cast: Sameera Reddy|Antara Mali|Sohail Khan|Saif Ali Khan|Boman Irani|Raghuvir Yadav|Revathi|Shilpa Shetty Kundra|Sanjay Kapoor|Nana Patekar|Vivek Oberoi|Aftab Shivdasani|Sushant Singh|Isha Koppikar|Rajpal Yadav|Gaurav Kapoor|Peeya Rai Chowdhary|Yusuf Hussain|Rajesh Khera|Malavika|Malavikka|Rahul Singh|Suman
keywords: power|group of friends|apple|reference to tom and jerry|story telling
title: Darna Mana Hai
